#line 1 "in-vals-ret-vals-in.txt" 
float4x4 mvp;

void main (
	float4 pos : POSITION,
	float2 uv : TEXCOORD0,
	float3 normal : NORMAL,
	float4 color : COLOR,
	out float4 opos : POSITION,
	out float ofog : FOG,
	out float2 ouv : TEXCOORD0,
	out float4 ocolor : COLOR
)
{
	opos = mul (mvp, pos);
	ocolor = color;
	ocolor.rgb += normal;
	ouv = uv;
}
